name: Jahez
0:
”Alexa, open Jahez”
”Alexa, open Jahez and check menu”
”Alexa, open Jahez and check status of my order”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jahez
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Jahez is a Saudi Platform that specializes in delivering restaurant orders online. Because quality is our standard, we are keen at Jahez to provide a unique customer experience.

With Jahez skill and Alexa, you can place an order, listen to the menu or know the status of your last order. Sounds exciting? Enable the Alexa skill to experience the same with Jahez.

To start using the skill, please follow the given instructions.
Enable the skill on the Alexa app.
Log in with the mobile number registered with Jahez
Enter the OTP to validate your identity.
Try our latest menu by saying Alexa, open jahez, and check the latest menu.

Your Food Is Ready. Enjoy your food with Jahez.
